messages.title: My Private Member's Bill
messages.content: Given the opportunity I would introduce legislation through a Private Member's Bill; named the, Victims of Domestic Violence Bill. It would make statutory, the Multi Agency Violence Risk Assessment Conferences. Providing a Safety Plan for all victims of Domestic Violence.

messages.title: Think Different. Think Plaid.
messages.content: At a time when people have never felt so angry and let down by the same old politics Westminster, more and more people are turning to Plaid because they know Plaid offers something different.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Jeff Rees will campaign for the introduction of a Living Pension.
Jeff Rees will campaign for the regulation of Bankers bonuses.
Jeff Rees will campaign for better treatment for our Veterans.

leaflet.personalStatement: Jeff Rees is 46 years old, divorced with an adult son. He a Plaid Councillor, incidentally never claiming expenses. His work background is from the business sector, knowing the importance of entrepreneurial spirit. Having lived overseas, he has seen how countries smaller than Wales successfully make their own laws and policies to benefit their own people.

endorsements.endorsement: Dafydd Wigley supports Jeff Rees's call to give World Heritage Status to Newport Transporter Bridge.

images.caption: Dafydd Wigley and Jeff Rees in front of the Newport Transporter Bridge.
